description: Make a splash this season with the limited-edition 2025 Easton Hype Fire “Pool Party” USSSA bat, designed to bring ultimate poolside energy to the field. Known as the #1 performance bat in USSSA baseball, it combines a fresh splash of style with the same game-changing performance of the original Easton Hype Fire. With its massive sweet spot, explosive barrel response, smooth feel, and effortless pop, this bat is perfect for those summer tournaments or just soaking up dingers.
